title: Transfers to take advantage of chapter
context: PART VI. ADMINISTRATIVE REMEDIES [ยง657D-51] Transfers to take advantage of chapter. Notwithstanding the provisions of this chapter to the contrary, the court shall enter such lawful judgment or order, in any proceeding to enforce a civil right, where the court is satisfied that any interest, property, or contract, since July 1, 1994, has been transferred or acquired with intent to delay the just enforcement of such right by taking advantage of this chapter. [L 1994, c 257, pt of ยง2] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 1994&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
